title: Crop Circles in Kansas
description: Resembling a work of modern art, variegated green crop circles cover what was once shortgrass prairie in southwestern Kansas. The most common crops in this region—Finney County—are corn, wheat, and sorghum.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
